actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the December 31, 1989, termination of the period within which a Vietnam-era veteran may use educational assistance benefits under chapter 34 of that title.

summary.text: Repeals the delimiting period for the use of educational assistance benefits by Vietnam-era veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the December 31, 1989, termination of the period within which a Vietnam-era veteran may use educational assistance benefits under chapter 34 of that title.
